meanings.definition: To take a recreational drug for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: She was joypopping with her friends at the party.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys joypopping on the weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the plant and started joypopping on the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The music was so good that it felt like joypopping on a melody.
meanings.sent5: The children were joypopping with laughter during the game.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming a recreational drug for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: Joypopping can have serious consequences if done irresponsibly.
meanings.sent2: She was caught in the act of joypopping by her parents.
meanings.sent3: The joypopping at the concert was evident from the behavior of the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The joypopping in the movie made it unrealistic and exaggerated.
meanings.sent5: The joypopping in the park was a concern for the community.
